page.title: 13INVERNESS ROYAL ACADEMY
page.content:
{INVERNESS ROYAL ACADEMY}is a Secondary school which moved to new buildings at Culduthel, on the outskirts of Inverness,in August, 1979.However, despite the newness of the buildings, it is a school with an ancient history, and can trace its background to 1223 with the founding of a{DOMINICAN PRIORY}in the Friars St. area. Advancement in Education has made 3 different moves necessary to give the school the room to expand.
The school building is very modern with language labs, microcomputer labs, a lovely lecture theatre and lots more. It has a well_equipped gymnasium, blaize pitches and grass playing fields. Some of the classes are held in 9 huts which are hoped to be omly temporary.
